name: The Wizard Ran 5
description:
• Next game: January 11th
  • Previous game
  • First game
  • More helicopter fun

The fifth episode in the wizard's adventures! A week late because of the holiday. This one was made for the  "Broke for Xmas" game jam. In this chapter, the wizard is broke and must make a lot of money by selling eggs. Also, you can burn the trees.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar/X/Shift: interact
  • M: hold to bring out map
  • Balldude is a bit hungover and cannot attend
